channel.title: Delta|Greater Vancouver Regional District|British Columbia|Canada on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Delta|Greater Vancouver Regional District|British Columbia|Canada on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: BC-99 North - Vancouver and Airport
item.description: Variable message sign on BC-99 North approaching the George Massey Tunnel. Use BC-99 north for Vancouver and Airport

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/BC-17A/Ladner River Road. Continue north on BC-99 for Richmond and Vancouver. Use BC-17 West for the Tsawwassen Ferry Terminals.

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/To BC-17A/Ladner.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 20
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 20 - Ladner Trunk Road/South Delta.

item.title: BC-99 North - Delta
item.description: Entering municipality of Delta on BC-99 North. Next three exits have access to Delta.
